attributes.action: Make it illegal to allow parents to get their children's ears pierced.
attributes.background:
In the UK parents are allowed to get their children's ears pierced from as young as 2 months old (after the baby's first tetanus vaccination) 

I think it should be illegal to get children's ears pierced until they are of a mature age to make the decision them self.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure what age you would like young people to be able to have their ears pierced. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
